website_summaries.verdict: If you need a cheap bike for your commute, this is an excellent deal.
pros: This is a great beginner bike with its simple design and straightforward assembly
Customers find the gear ratio just right for mild grade hills
The welded steel frame comes in seven sizes and 18 color options
cons: Some customers received damaged parts out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Best Bike for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Spending $200 on a bicycle had me a bit worried about the quality of what I'd be getting. From the moment I opened the package I knew I made the right choice. Sure, it's a simple base model, but with a minimum of extra spending and imagination, it's the perfect base to start a cool and reasonably priced project Fixie. Couldn't be happier with this purchase...
customer_reviews.author: christopher depinto

customer_reviews.title: Whack
customer_reviews.text: Brakes were flimsy and pedals popped off during a morning ride. Good frame but horrible tires. Did not come with instructions. Update from April 6th 2020: I ended up going to a bicycle shop to fix it and ended up paying 100$ extra, I only changed the tires and the seat plus the handle (steering wheel) and now July 18th 2020, one of the wheels popped. Worst investment.
customer_reviews.author: J Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Strong contender for wallet friendly and eye friendly fixie bicycle.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fixie bike for the price. Recieved bicycle fairly quick after placing order. Bicycle was packaged securely in bubble wrap and foam. Though there was one golf ball sized dent in front tire's rim. The bicycle was fairly easy to put together and also came with most tools you need to assemble besides missing one allen wrench. If your looking for a sharp looking, reliable, and easy on your wallet single speed I suggest this bicycle from Golden Cycles. :)
customer_reviews.author: DiRtyPaTh

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the value
customer_reviews.text: You will require some basic tools that aren't provided for assembly, as well as an adapter to pump tires from a standard pump. Besides this, the bike itself is excellent for city/road use and is easy to maintain with the provided tools. Chain tightening and brake tightening should be done occasionally after assembly, but otherwise the bike runs well on its own. It is lightweight as expected, and can reach fairly high speeds, also as expected for a single speed. The main strength of this bike is its price. It is a good product for the price you pay, and will last you a good amount of time if you take care of it when you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Good seller, not a bad bike for the $
customer_reviews.text: My son and my wife each purchased one of these bikes. I liked theirs so much I bought one too. Both of theirs went together without a hitch. Mine arrived with a bent chain ring which the vendor promptly replaced. Not a bad bike for the commuter or fitness rider being single speed and simple. I changed tires, handlebars and the rear cog to my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gifford

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best $200 I have ever spent on a bike. Where I live there are no hills and this Fixie Single Speed Bike was exactly what I need to commute to and from work. Very easy to put together, it just took the afternoon to do, and everything is adjustable for my needs. Aesthetically the bike is very pleasing to the eye (I have the black with blue rims) and have gotten a lot of compliments on it already and I've only had it a few days! I received the bike much faster than anticipated, with no bends or breaks to any parts. 10/10 would buy again! (And probably will once my husband admits he wants one himself!)
customer_reviews.author: gwentissential

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is well put together using low-mid grade components. Assembly was easy enough but I am pretty good with bicycles. No instructuons are provided. Take care when setting any screws as they will cross thread and strip fairly easily. Overall this is a good bike for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, great bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike was packed well, so I don't think damage is too much of a worry, except a few tiny nicks in the paint, which isn't noticeable unless you're LOOKING for it. There was a small issue with how the bike shop put the pedal on, but customer support helped with replacing the parts. Putting it together isn't tough; the brakes are already on and so are the main parts. You've only got to put the handlebars, pedals, and front tire in place. It's preset to freewheel, but it has a fixed gear as well.
customer_reviews.author: cool

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Rear wheel did not fit frame properly; after working with my son a bit, neither of us were able to get in into the frame properly so we called in professional help. He had to carefully bend the frame to get things assembled. Once it was eventually put together my son enjoyed it quite a bit, and it seems sturdy. I'd advise against DIY for the average person, though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Look good and rides good.
customer_reviews.text: I had never ridden a golden cycle bicycle before and was pleasantly surprised. I have many bikes, but this one is one of my favorites. Its simple, elegant and smooth. Very light weight, but also strong. I weight very close to 300 lbs, but the bike handles me with ease. I highly recommend this brand and this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Beginner Bike
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bike. I think it is ok for now even though the cross bar could be wider... I had to replace the grips, the original grips were garbage. I think eventually I will have to replace the cross bar too.
customer_reviews.author: Somnorici

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with proper equipment for assembly as advertised or INSTRUCTIONS!!! Ended up having to pay a bike shop to assemble it. I’ll let you know when this thing permanently falls apart. Pedals didn’t fit right and brake cable way too long. But it’s $200 so whatever you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very light bike for the price I love the color details they put into evry bike, the logos are nice and clean with sharp images. The tires are 100xbetter than the 1s you find out in the stores and again this is very light I'd say under 100 pounds
customer_reviews.author: LOADING...

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike, awesome service!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bike! Had some issues with UPS, but Jim’s Bikes and Boards did the right thing and helped me make sure I got my bike. So happy with the product and especially the service.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Vega

customer_reviews.title: Wrong items sent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bike strictly due to the color combo - I drove 1.5hrs to the us to pick it up, by the looks of it the wheels were switched out and put on a different frame. The sticker on the frame shown on manufactures website is teal mine is black and it came with black handlebars when it should have come with teal. There are​ also no instructions on how to put the bike together.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa. L

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bike. After putting everything together I realized the crank was bent so I had to try to bend it back. Also the rear tire popped after a couple hours of riding. So now I have to save up money to go to a bike shop to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike, Great vendor!
customer_reviews.text: Got my Oil Slick 55. Beautiful bike. smooth as glass. But more importantly, Jim’s Bikes and Boards! Great Folks! They service what they sell!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Manos

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level bicycle. Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Entry level single speed or fixed bike. Can't go wrong. Solid delivery in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: william wolf

customer_reviews.title: well made product and a decent price
customer_reviews.text: It came nicely packaged and well protected, assembly was easy and straight forward and also came with its own tools. the bike works, looks and rides nicely. The only other thing that would have been nice would be zip ties or something to hold the brake cable to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A Rhea

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself is fine. My issue was that they send it to you with no instructions whatsoever. Not even lame Ikea-type instructions. Nothing. I had to email Jim and ask for it. Then they link me to a video of a professional putting together an almost already put together bike, nothing about the breaks or anything, not helpful. After hours of being pissed off trying to do it alone they send me a PDF a day later. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sattem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, using as my main ride for commuting. Wonderful to ride, simple to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: So first of all no't all the required tools to mount the bike are present, you need one 5mm Allen wrench that isn't included. Secondly when I put air in the back wheel (100psi - On the wheels it's written from 90 psi to 110psi) it popped out and exploded.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Best single speed for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product came incredibly well packed by Jim’s Bikes and Boards. Installation was relatively easy. The bike is well made and looks great. Probably the best bike I’ve seen for the price. I had one minor issue and the customer service team was fantastic about handling it. One pedal was stripped and they immediately shipped me a new upgraded set. Would definitely recommend and I’ll be purchasing from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the matte black frame and the bright blue wheels! Seems to be a sturdy bike, especially for the price. Straight forward assembly, but for those who don't know anything about bikes, I'd recommend purchasing the expert assembly (as it doesn't come with instructions). Very happy with this bike and can't wait for some warmer weather to ride it in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Pedal continues to fall off. I'm very disappointed - love the look, but the quality is very poor. I assembled the bike correctly and about 3 rides in, the left pedal just feel off. To make matters worst, the pedal screw threading appears to be stripped now. I'm goiing to have to replace the whole crank set...
customer_reviews.author: Danny P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality superior to competitors
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bike is outstanding, it’s a good and affordable price, and the convenience of being able to have it delivered and assembled at home is an awesome feature other companies don’t have available. Also being able to support a company based in Southern California is a huge plus, since that is my home state. Keep doing what you guys are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob T.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive fixie at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of riding a fixie. This bike came with the tools needed to assemble the seat, pedals, brakes, etc. I did need to use my own hex wrenches for the handlebars. The price is 40% less than I have paid for similar bikes in the past. I have no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike was packaged horribly and on top of that the rear wheel couldn’t even fit on the bike because the sizing was wrong. Bad experience and would not recommend this bike, it’s cheaply made and not worth the price. I would recommend saving and spending the extra money on a better bike.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS. RIDES WELL. Didn't come with instructions, ...
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS. RIDES WELL. Didn't come with instructions, but I don't​ care. I know how to put these things together.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Missing tools
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for the money, but not when you consider the extra tools you need. The hex wrenches provided don't fit with the screws needed to mount the handle bars. For some reason, the chain came wrapped around the chainstay and a chain tool is needed to remove it for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: best!
customer_reviews.text: I trust in this bike, rode this baby! Good for the value money!
customer_reviews.author: Jose R.

customer_reviews.title: Great started bike got my little brother who's 10 this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great started bike got my little brother who's 10 this bike and it's a great bike for him to beat up and learn how to use it took him about 3mth and now he's full on fixed but I do recommend getting drops the risers it comes with are good but drops are better
customer_reviews.author: roger ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Daily commuter A+
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike been riding daily for last few months and hasn’t let me done.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bike a few months now and have put 300 plus miles on it. It is working well with no issues , the wheels have stayed true and I like the geometry of the frame. For what it costs I think it's a good deal, and a great budget fixie.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Needs a build manual
customer_reviews.text: Great product for this price point and Jim's bikes even threw in a front break! Would've liked a build manual or even a link to a YouTube video to help the process along but some google-fu and technical know how will get this bike good to ride in an hour or two
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Silva

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: The bike looked just as it was advertised. I was very happy with how it looked. It was not too difficult to put together either, took about a half hour. Easy and smooth to ride. Overall very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lib C

customer_reviews.title: it's not a bad bike. Nothing great
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's not a bad bike. Nothing great. You can tell where they skimp on quality. Plastic pedals, for example. Still I good buy. Came in on time, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. Gorgeous color and fairly easy to put together. The seat hurts my crotch badly but that's to be expected with most bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Veezootz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike! Beautiful paint! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the money! Came mostly assembled; just the handlebars, front wheel, front brake, and pedal to install- easy peasy! Freaky fast shipping- received it in approximately three days. Super lightweight, the components look solid, color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: A solid entry-level fixie!
customer_reviews.text: After riding several fixed gear bikes ranging from fairly cheap to fairly expensive, Golden Cycles is a solid entry level bike particularly for its low price! Assembly is easy and the ride is smooth. In addition, parts can be easily interchangeable and upgraded if a rider desired.
customer_reviews.author: droch

customer_reviews.title: Solid bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: For a $200 bike you can't do much better. Solid Frame, paint job, wheel build, and packaging. The cranks, chainring, cog and tires are all pretty cheap, but that's what makes this a great bike to start building and upgrade
customer_reviews.author: ben m.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike to get around campus! Good customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my college bound son and it has just right combination of utility and fun to get around campus. I applaud the seller on great customer service in that I found the bottom bracket to be lacking and in need of replacement which they quickly sent out!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Condon

customer_reviews.title: Great price and built well.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. It is well built and fast. Would’ve enjoyed it for many years of riding if it wasn’t stolen today off of my girlfriends property today.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, feels sturdy and well built for city biking
customer_reviews.text: I use this for commuting to/from work, its perfect because it is lightweight and gets me around pretty quickly. The colors help me stand out to cars and the bike feels very sturdy for city biking.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bike is nice quality for the price. Easy assembly. Light construction but sturdy feel. Ride is smooth. Can’t wait to go on family rides.
customer_reviews.author: A. Camaya

customer_reviews.title: Best value single-speed/fixie. Stylish, well-made!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely great bicycle! The value is unbelievable. It really sails and is very lightweight for being steel. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat broke soon after I bought it. It gets ...
customer_reviews.text: Seat broke soon after I bought it. It gets me from where I want to go but the seat is now broken and I have to spend extra money to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Meta

customer_reviews.title: awesome bike - thank you GC
customer_reviews.text: awesome bike, not hard to assemble just need a different sized Allen key from the one provided in the box - looks great on the road too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived nicely secured and package. Item is just as described on the website. Perfect sizing, lightweight, and easy to ride. Very satisfied with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Hua

customer_reviews.title: Great bike !
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with this bike specially for the price!!! I already customized it my way and i only spend a few extra bucks to get this bike the way i like!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhon h garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This bike is awesome! It is perfect for city riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why they don’t give one tool more?
customer_reviews.text: Is a good bicycle but they should give the bike with its tools. Because they give the bike only with 2 tools and without a manual for that.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: As promised. Great Product n Price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering n delivery times Great!! Received in pristine condition. Product is Great!! Price is Great! Would highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bike
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for the price. I'm enjoying the single gear right now, you'll definitely want to replace the sea though
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: The description from the seller was great. It's really hard to find small frames for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike for my daughter. The description from the seller was great. It's really hard to find small frames for shorter women. Golden cycle's builds a quality product that's built very nice. Tires rims and components are easy to put together. Shipping arrived one day early and was perfect timing for my daughters birthday. If you need a smooth stylish cool Fixie bike. TRY GOLDEN CYCLES!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Rims are the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I received silver instead of gold but the bike is good. Decided that'll keep it with the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Michel Harakandi

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bike!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome packaging at, since it was a fixed gear cogs were already tight and chained lubed and also the chain fitted perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: V7 MURDA

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! I'm a bigger girl and it holds strong. So easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: kristi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is good. Had a little bit of trouble with it but its a good bike for the price. Also love the color.
customer_reviews.author: sigifredo Contreras Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, everything works other than the brakes, they are a little rusty
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Quinonez

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great! Worth the purchase. Couldn't be more pleased. For the price you couldn't have asked for more. I recommend anyone looking for the best option without having to spend a ton of money, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: starpunctures

customer_reviews.title: Sit is incredible uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a couple days, but I can already tell you that the sit is incredible uncomfortable. Will have to replace it for sure. It might as well come without it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner fixie/single speed bike
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bike. Everything went together well and tuned it all myself. I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: O. VALDES

customer_reviews.title: Super solid!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price! Light, perfect gear ratio at 44/16 and super cool. Only problem is the s*** tubes and tires that come with the bike. After a 15 minute ride with the tube low psi (90) my rear tube popped out of nowhere! But thats nothing! Overall review is a super solid commuter for a super low price thats very pretty. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Best bike ever
customer_reviews.text: good bike the only thing is that the brakes squeak to much while i brake.but amazing bike
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: but all in all great bike for riding around campus
customer_reviews.text: get what you pay for. but all in all great bike for riding around campus
customer_reviews.author: Harry Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this bicycle
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this bicycle. Great bike for the price! It rides very smooth and I love the matte black color.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Conley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bike is fantastic can't argue with the price I paid it is a great bike
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color and too short
customer_reviews.text: Handle too short and they gave me the wrong color... Smh.. I didn't wanna do all the trouble of returning it
customer_reviews.author: Marcos S.

customer_reviews.title: Love my bike and the tires have been good and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my bike and the tires have been good and I have had the bike for a year. I get alot of compliments on the bike. Wish the paint didnt chip so much though. I had a teal retrospect and it did not chip like this one. Then again the retrospect was a metallic teal or chrome teal and this one os just normal shiny paint.
customer_reviews.author: catlover

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Shocked by the low build quality, given all the good reviews. Came with damaged fork right out of the box. Rear hub bearings are FUBAR, a ton of resistance in both the bearings and the freewheel. Needs to be replaced, which is ok because I'm doing a coaster brake conversion anyway, would be unacceptable otherwise. Chain isn't even a fixie chain, it's flexible as hell, clearly a normal bike chain. Beware of this bike, I would choose 6KU, which I had before, over this one in a hearbeat.
customer_reviews.author: hellaGkimz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome delivery, price, and look!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered right on time! It didn't come with any instructions, but it wasn't my first rodeo. Easy build and looks absolutely great! I usually remove the decals, but it's a really nice look with the bike. I ordered the size 48 Striker for my girlfriend if anyone was wondering. Good Job Golden Cycles
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

product_meta.title: Golden Cycles Single Speed Fixed Gear Bike with Front & Rear Brakes
product_meta.description: Our builds come equipped with a flip flop hub with both, fixed gear cog and single speed sprocket. A collection built whether you're an experience rider or a regular commuter. With custom riser bars to tackle the urban city and ride comfortably as you explore your surrounding nature. Our Golden Cycles collection is a quality bicycle that all can enjoy.
feature_bullets: Frame: high tensile steel fully tig-welded fork: 1-1/8 inch steel fork brakes: front & rear
Headset: 1-1/8 inch neco headset handlebar: alloy custom riser bars
Chain ring crank: alloy 46T bottom bracket: sealed bearing 68mm
Wheels: 45mm deep alloy rims hubs: 32hole sealed bearing flip flop hub
Tires: 700C x 25 Kenda pedals: BMX platform
